aboutUsSection.label: ABOUT US
aboutUsSection.heading: Holistic Cancer Care Through Ayurvedic Wisdom
aboutUsSection.description: We provide compassionate, natural treatments rooted in ancient Ayurvedic principles. Our approach strengthens the body, mind, and spirit—supporting recovery and long-term well-being. Every patient receives personalized care through herbal therapies, detox programs, and dietary plans.

trustedExperts.heading: We’re Trusted Experts in Ayurvedic Cancer Healing
trustedExperts.description: Ayurveda, the science of life, offers natural and effective cancer care. Our Ayurvedic doctors use centuries-old wisdom and personalized herbal treatments to support healing, reduce side effects, and enhance quality of life for patients at every stage.
trustedExperts.highlight: All types and all stages of cancer are treated with a healthy and holistic approach.

doctorsSection.label: MEET OUR DOCTORS
doctorsSection.heading: Meet the smile behind your care

faqs.question: Do you accept health insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept major health insurance providers. Please contact our front desk with your policy details so we can verify your coverage for Ayurvedic treatments.

faqs.question: What should I bring to my first appointment?
faqs.answer: Please bring your past medical records, a list of current medications, and any recent lab reports. This helps our doctors create the most effective personalized treatment plan for you.

faqs.question: Are the consultations available online?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer video consultations for patients who cannot visit the clinic in person. Medicines can be shipped to your location after the consultation.

faqs.question: How long does a typical treatment last?
faqs.answer: Treatment duration varies depending on the type and stage of cancer, as well as the patient's overall health. A typical course may last from 3 to 6 months, with regular follow-ups.

faqs.question: Is Ayurvedic treatment safe during chemotherapy?
faqs.answer: Our Rasayana therapies are designed to be complementary. They can often be safely taken alongside conventional treatments to help reduce side effects and boost immunity, but always consult with your oncologist and our doctors first.

timeline.title: Foundation Year
timeline.description: Our Ayurvedic Cancer Hospital was founded with a vision to provide holistic, natural, and compassionate cancer care rooted in Ayurveda. The first center was established with a small team of dedicated Ayurvedic doctors and herbal specialists.

timeline.title: Expansion & Research
timeline.description: A decade later, we expanded our facilities to include a dedicated research wing for Ayurvedic oncology. We began documenting patient outcomes and integrating modern diagnostic tools with traditional practices.

timeline.title: Global Recognition
timeline.description: By 2020, our unique approach gained international recognition. We launched our telemedicine services, allowing patients from around the globe to access our specialized care protocols.

timeline.title: Future of Holistic Care
timeline.description: Looking ahead, we are establishing a new state-of-the-art integrative care center. Our mission continues: to bring the healing power of Ayurveda to every cancer patient in need.

moreAboutUs.label: MORE ABOUT US
moreAboutUs.heading: We Are An Ayurvedic Hospital, Providing Hope & Healing Through Ayurveda
moreAboutUs.description: We are a dedicated Ayurvedic Cancer Care Hospital committed to providing natural, holistic, and personalized healing to patients battling cancer. Our approach blends ancient Ayurvedic wisdom with modern medical insights, ensuring compassionate and effective treatment for every individual.
details: We focus on restoring balance in the body through herbal medicines, Panchakarma therapies, dietary guidance, and lifestyle changes — promoting healing from within and enhancing overall well-being.
We embrace ongoing research and innovation in Ayurvedic oncology, striving to bring safe, sustainable, and result-oriented care to all our patients.

Together, our team of experienced Ayurvedic doctors and therapists bring decades of expertise, ensuring each patient receives a customized treatment plan designed for long-term recovery, rejuvenation, and improved quality of life.

moreInfo.bookCare: Book Care in 60 Seconds To Be A Healthy Patient
moreInfo.guidanceDescription: Our expert Ayurvedic oncologists are here to provide comprehensive, personalized care. From initial consultation to post-treatment support, we are dedicated to your holistic well-being.

items.name: Sarah Jenkins
items.text: The care I received was exceptional. The doctors were attentive and the holistic approach really helped me through my recovery journey. I felt supported every step of the way.

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.text: Professional, compassionate, and knowledgeable. The combination of modern medicine and Ayurvedic treatments made a huge difference in my energy levels.

items.name: Amanda Doe
items.text: I cannot thank the team enough. They treated me like family and the facility is top-notch. Highly recommended for anyone seeking comprehensive cancer care.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.text: My father received excellent palliative care here. The pain management techniques used were very effective and gentle.

items.name: Priya Patel
items.text: The preventive oncology program gave me peace of mind. The lifestyle guidance and seasonal detox plans have improved my overall health significantly.

items.title: Panchakarma Therapy
items.description: Deep detoxification therapies including Vamana, Virechana, and Basti to cleanse the body of toxins and restore balance.

items.title: Rasayana Rejuvenation
items.description: Specialized herbal formulations to boost immunity, enhance vitality (Ojas), and promote cellular repair during recovery.

items.title: Diet & Lifestyle
items.description: Personalized Ayurvedic diet plans (Pathya-Apathya) and lifestyle guidance to support healing and prevent recurrence.

items.title: Yoga & Meditation
items.description: Therapeutic yoga asanas and Pranayama to reduce stress, improve mental resilience, and support physical well-being.

items.title: Palliative Care
items.description: Integrative care focus on pain management and improving quality of life for patients with advanced stages of cancer.

items.title: Preventive Oncology
items.description: Holistic strategies for high-risk individuals focusing on immune strengthening and early detection through Ayurveda.

items.title: Book Appointment
items.description: Schedule your visit online or via phone. Our team will guide you through the initial requirements.

items.title: Initial Consultation
items.description: Meet with our Ayurvedic experts for a detailed pulse diagnosis (Nadi Pariksha) and health assessment.

items.title: Personalized Treatment
items.description: Receive a customized plan including Rasayana therapies, dietary changes, and herbal medicines.

items.title: Recovery & Follow-up
items.description: Regular monitoring and support to ensure your path to holistic healing and well-being.

treatmentsSection.label: TREATMENTS
treatmentsSection.heading: All Types of Cancer Treatment Under One Roof

items.title: Liver Cancer
items.description: Ayurvedic care to support liver function, detoxify the body (Yakrut Shodhan), and boost immunity using targeted herbal therapies.

items.title: Kidney Cancer
items.description: Focusing on restoring kidney health (Vrikka health) and balancing bodily fluids through specialized herbs and dietary adjustments.

items.title: Breast Cancer
items.description: Holistic management focusing on hormonal balance, lymphatic drainage, and reducing tumor progression through natural remedies.

items.title: Urinary Bladder Cancer
items.description: Natural therapies to soothe the urinary tract, reduce inflammation, and strengthen bladder function (Basti health).

items.title: Blood Cancer
items.description: Purification therapies (Raktamokshana) and immunity-enhancing herbs to support healthy blood cell production and vitality.

items.title: Prostate Cancer
items.description: Specialized care for men's health focusing on reducing prostate enlargement and balancing male hormones naturally.

departments.title: Gynaecology (Ayurvedic)
departments.description: Our Gynaecology department offers specialized Ayurvedic care for women's reproductive health. We focus on hormonal balance, menstrual disorders, PCOD/PCOS, and uterine health using natural herbal therapies and lifestyle modifications.

departments.title: Oncology (Ayurvedic Cancer Care)
departments.description: Our Oncology department provides comprehensive cancer treatment focusing on stopping tumor growth, preventing metastasis, and reducing the side effects of conventional treatments like chemotherapy and radiation.

departments.title: Orthopaedics
departments.description: The Orthopaedics department specializes in natural treatments for joint pain, arthritis, osteoarthritis, and other musculoskeletal disorders. We use Vata-balancing herbs and therapies to restore mobility and reduce pain.

items.title: OPD & IPD Facilities
items.description: Comprehensive Out-Patient and In-Patient departments for complete care.

items.title: Advanced Laboratory Tests
items.description: High-precision diagnostic testing for accurate health assessments.

items.title: Ultrasound & X-Ray Services
items.description: Modern imaging diagnositics available on-site.

items.title: Blood Testing Facilities
items.description: Full-spectrum hematology and blood investigations.

items.title: Cupping Therapy
items.description: Traditional Hijama and cupping therapies for pain and detox.

items.title: Regimental Therapy
items.description: Specialized Ilaj-bit-Tadbeer therapies for holistic healing.

items.title: Panchkarma Treatment
items.description: Complete Ayurvedic detoxification and rejuvenation procedures.

items.title: 24×7 Emergency Services
items.description: Round-the-clock emergency support and rapid response.

items.title: Clean, Safe & Patient-Friendly
items.description: Hygienic environment focused on patient safety and comfort.
